name: US Army Assassin Training 2017
description:
ASSASSIN TRAINING SCHOOL GAME
Here you will become the best assassin of the world! Complete training and become the ultimate sniper assassin!

After an intense battle with the enemy we beard a great loss on the line of control as we had less number of snipers and shooters. The enemy attacked with full force and destroyed our front bunkers and infiltrated in our land to some extent. Our military had to lose great lives and had to do a lot to push the enemy back into their filthy land.
Now is the time we prepare our young soldiers and commandos to be one of the best snipers and shooters to assassinate the bad guys coming from the front. Get into the training course of this military unit and be a shooter. You are already an intelligent mind and know how and what to do in a war, but let us get you into a hardcore weaponry training so that if next time the enemy dares to attack the border line, we would kill them in their places, we are in the process of making a battalion of sniper shooters whose specialty would be to assassinate the war lords and terrorist trying to invade the protected land of ours.

You are in a secret military camp which is officially not recognized by the government. Your are highly skilled sniper and your army has decided to make you a ruthless assassin to finish various tasks for your country. Your government and army provided you with a harsh and unmerciful training period in order to make you the best sniper assassin.

During your training period, you will hit sliding, moving, flying and even live targets. There are plenty of missions awaiting you to be done. After all of these missions, you will be sent for top secret assassination tasks.

You have various missions and tasks to complete in this training like hit shooting targets, long distance parachutes, target the assassins near the danger zone and prove to be an assassin shooter. You have various weapons to learn and use like Barrett M99, GOL Sniper Magnum and AWC G2. Shooting targets would be different in different levels of your training. If you do better, you get daily bonus too as a reward. Get ready soldier and get into the shoes of a commando sniper shooter and kill the infiltrators of this country.

Features
Immersible 3D environment
Real life sound effects
In-app purchases
Engaging gameplay
Challenging missions,
Chance to be a hero
Get trained on how to shoot
Multiple weapons to use
Army and military trainings.
-a variety of scenarios,
-Intelligent guidance system,
-Added a variety of gorgeous Weapons
-A variety of different training and assassination modes
